snippet.title: Zombie Derby 2 - Trailer
snippet.description:
Now available on Nintendo Switch! 🔥
Discover the dangerous post-apocalyptic world with cool upgradable cars! 

Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.herocraft.game.zombiederby2
App Store: https://itunes.apple.com/app/id1119164555
Xbox: https://www.microsoft.com/store/productid/9n9bx2x4d2pv
Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/762590/Zombie_Derby_2/
Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/zombie-derby-2-switch/
Microsoft Store: https://www.microsoft.com/store/productid/9p7b24dsdzf4
More: https://zombiederby.com/part_2/

Tired of hundreds of tedious titles? Try out Zombie Derby 2 and you will never be bored again! Once again, millions of bloodthirsty zombies are swarming all over the continent. Only the bravest and most experienced drivers will still be standing after fighting countless armies of the undead in this tough apocalyptic reality. Become one of the heroes in the new world and flip the script! It's time to upgrade to brutal supercars and clear the roads that are chock-a-block with zombies.
